casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Aaron Kenard WESTBROOK 301A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 6, 2018 Nicholas C. Woomer-Deters, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Westbrook, Aaron Kenard.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, L. Michael Dodd, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of November 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of November 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 13th day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
